data.title: Renault
data.meta_description: A Computer Science portal for geeks. It contains well written, well thought and well explained computer science and programming articles, quizzes and practice/competitive programming/company interview Questions.
data.text:
About Company

Renault, established in 1899 and headquartered in Boulogne-Billancourt, France, is a renowned international automobile manufacturer. The company is part of the Renault-Nissan-Mitsubishi Alliance and produces a wide range of vehicles, including cars, vans, trucks, and electric vehicles. Renault is also involved in motorsport, particularly in Formula 1.

Industry

Automotive Manufacturing

Company Size

Renault employs around 106,000 people worldwide and operates in more than 130 countries, making it a significant player in the global automotive market.

Products, Services, and Operations

Renault's offerings include:

Passenger Vehicles: A diverse lineup of cars including sedans, hatchbacks, and SUVs.

Commercial Vehicles: Vans and light trucks for business and industrial use.

Electric Vehicles: A growing range of electric and hybrid models.

Motorsport: Involvement in Formula 1 and other racing series.

Key Tech-Related Job Roles at Renault

Renault offers several IT and tech-focused roles essential to its operations and innovation:

Job RoleDescriptionSoftware EngineerDevelops software for vehicle systems and digital services.Data ScientistAnalyzes data to improve vehicle performance and customer experience.IT Project ManagerManages IT projects, including system integrations and digital transformations.Cybersecurity SpecialistProtects digital assets and ensures data security.Network EngineerDesigns and manages the network infrastructure supporting global operations.

Salaries at Renault (Tech-Related Positions)
